text.section: For purposes of subsection (a)(5) of this section, the price of cigarettes sold under subsections (a)(1) through (4) of this section is not the lawful price of a competitor.

In calculating the basic cost of cigarettes purchased at a sale under subsections (a)(1) through (4) of this section or at any other sale outside the ordinary channels of trade, a retailer or wholesaler shall use, instead of invoice costs, the replacement cost of the cigarettes based on the quantity last purchased by him through the ordinary channels of trade.
